  • Method Details

    • after

      public static boolean after​(BooleanBlankMethod logic, BlankMethod afterMethod)
      Similar to ifAfter(BooleanBlankMethod, BlankMethod, BlankMethod). Runs afterMethod immediately after logic is true.
      Will not run again until logic is true, then false again.
      Parameters:
      logic - Should be a Boolean
      afterMethod - Runs after logic is false
      Returns:
      Boolean returns true when afterMethod is run, otherwise returns false
      See Also:
      ifAfter(BooleanBlankMethod, BlankMethod, BlankMethod)

    • ifAfter

      public static boolean ifAfter​(BooleanBlankMethod logic, BlankMethod methodWhenTrue, BlankMethod afterMethod)
      If logic is true, runs methodWhenTrue. As soon as logic is false, runs afterMethod.
      Will not run again until logic is true, then false again.
      Parameters:
      logic - Should be a Boolean
      methodWhenTrue - Runs if logic is true
      afterMethod - Runs after logic is false
      Returns:
      Boolean returns true when afterMethod is run, otherwise returns false

    • getInSet

      public static java.lang.Object getInSet​(java.util.Set set, int index)
      Gets an object in a set at index
      Parameters:
      set - Set to get object from
      index -
      Returns:
      Object in set at index, if none is found, returns null

    • addWrap

      public static float addWrap​(float num1, float num2, float min, float max)
      Adds num1 and num2, if the result exceeds min or max, wraps around
      Parameters:
      num1 - First number to add
      num2 - Second number to add
      min - Min limit
      max - Max limit
      Returns:
      Integer result of num1 + num2

    • ifNumberReturnNumber

      public static float ifNumberReturnNumber​(float number, float checkNumber, float trueNumber, float falseNumber)
      Parameters:
      number -
      checkNumber - Number to check if number is equal to
      trueNumber - Number to return if true
      falseNumber - Number to return if false
      Returns:
      trueNumber if number == checkNumber, otherwise returns falseNumber

    • ifNumberReturnNumber

      public static float ifNumberReturnNumber​(float number, float checkNumber, float trueNumber)
      Parameters:
      number -
      checkNumber - Number to check if number is equal to
      trueNumber - Number to return if true
      Returns:
      trueNumber if number == checkNumber, otherwise returns number
